pos_mean_info_list.mean: 北方的，向北的；来自北方的

bilingual.source: The boy in this picture lives in the Arctic region of northern Alaska.
bilingual.target: 这张照片中的男孩住在阿拉斯加北部的北极地区。

bilingual.source: Deep in Russia's northern forest lived an old woodcutter and his wife.
bilingual.target: 在俄罗斯北部的森林深处住着一位老樵夫和他的妻子。

bilingual.source: The Bernina Express follows a route that runs from Eastern Switzerland to Northern Italy.
bilingual.target: 伯尔尼纳快车沿着一条从瑞士东部到意大利北部的路线行驶。

bilingual.source: Estonia is a country located in Northern Europe.
bilingual.target: 爱沙尼亚是一个位于欧洲北部的国家。

bilingual.source: Chiang Mai is an ancient city in northern Thailand.
bilingual.target: 清迈是泰国北部的一座古城。

bilingual.source: The gharial can be found in the rivers of northern India.
bilingual.target: 印度鳄可以在印度北部的河流中找到。

bilingual.source: Bird were more likely to die than German storks that flew only as far as northern Morocco.
bilingual.target: 这种鸟类比只飞到摩洛哥北部的德国鹳更容易死亡。

bilingual.source: Last Summer I went to Chiang Mai, in northern Thailand with my family.
bilingual.target: 去年夏天，我和家人去了泰国北部的清迈。

bilingual.source: In Nuodeng Mountain area in northern Dali.
bilingual.target: 在云南大理北部的诺邓山区。

bilingual.source: It's Hudiksvall. It's a city in northern Sweden.
bilingual.target: 这是胡迪克斯瓦尔 瑞典北部的一座城市。

list.abstract: Northern是提供的存储配额管理方案的意思，Northern Storage Suite是一套针对企业存储资源使用管理的软件解决方案。

yingyinNormal.en: Paris is situated in Northern France on the banks of the River Seine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴黎位于法国北部的塞纳-马恩省河畔。

yingyinNormal.en: Your machine seems to be even more aggressive than Northern Lights.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的机器看起来比北极光更为激进。

yingyinNormal.en: On the island's northern tip, in the Polol Valley, overlook the sprawling forest reserves of Hawaii's lush northern region, the birthplace of Kamehameha the First.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在岛的北端，波罗陆山谷上，俯瞰夏威夷北部繁茂的森林保护区，卡米哈米哈一世的出生地。

yingyinNormal.en: Once they get to the Euphrates, they'll have a choke hold on northern Syria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦他们进入幼发拉底河流域，他们将扼住北叙利亚的命门。

yingyinNormal.en: This custom was later appropriated by Northern Europeans and eventually it becomes the so-called Christmas tree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种风俗后来被北欧人继承，于是演变成了现在的圣诞树。

yingyinNormal.en: The word Beijing actually means northern capital. The city lies in the northeast of the country, surrounded by desert and mountains.
yingyinNormal.zh: 北京的意思是北方的首都，北京坐落于中国北方，被沙漠和山脉包围。

yingyinNormal.en: The great Wall of China snakes for over 5000 miles across northern and western China, and the oldest parts date back over 2500 years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长城在中国北部和西部蜿蜒超过八千公里，最古老的部分可以追溯到两千五百年前。

yingyinNormal.en: And watching over the entire system, are the people in this state-of-the-art bunker in Northern Virginia, People like flight manager Debra Griffith.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个系统就好像人们在南维吉尼亚的艺术碉堡中，比如飞行管理员黛布拉·格利菲恩。

yingyinNormal.en: I should lead our soldiers to conquer the northern heartland and attempt to remove the hateful traitors, restore the house of Han, and return it to the former capital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当奖率三军，北定中原，庶竭驽钝，攘除奸凶，兴复汉室，还于旧都。

yingyinNormal.en: He's getting clobbered in the northern part of the state. Low turnout in Cleveland's not helping. But he could still pull it out. He's not going to win and he knows it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他在州北的情况很糟。克利夫兰的低投票率也是个问题。但他还能扭转局势。他赢不了的，他也清楚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 西北；西北部；西北方
adj. 位于北方的；朝北的；生活在北方的；源自北方的；北方的；北方居民的；北方吹来的
adj. 东北方的；来自东北的；在东北的

word_family.mean: n. 北；北方；北部；北家；（North）诺思

examination_example.sentence: As a result, residents of five buildings around the <highlight>northern</highlight> side of the cathedral were being temporarily evacuated, he added.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他补充说，因此，大教堂北侧周围五栋建筑的居民被暂时疏散。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, the Inuit people of the Arctic regions have created incredible modes to deal with the challenges of living in <highlight>northern</highlight> climates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，北极地区的因纽特人创造了难以置信的模式来应对北方气候的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: The name had stuck ever since Chinese immigrants arrived on the shores of <highlight>Northern</highlight> California in the 1850s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从19世纪50年代中国移民来到北加利福尼亚海岸后，这个名字就一直流传至今。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: After staying overnight in London, we travel on Day 2 to <highlight>northern</highlight> France to visit the World War I battlefields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在伦敦过夜后，我们在第二天前往法国北部，参观第一次世界大战的战场。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 东北方的；来自东北的；在东北的

word_family.mean: n. 北；北方；北部；北家；（North）诺思

examination_example.sentence: We live at the most <highlight>northern</highlight> part of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们住在世界的最北部。

examination_example.sentence: When did drinking tea get popular in <highlight>Northern</highlight> China?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国北方什么时候开始流行喝茶的?

examination_example.sentence: There is less rain in the southern part than in the <highlight>northern</highlight> part, so the south is drier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 南方的雨水比北方少，所以南方更干燥。
